entry.title: HTB Write Up - Bypass
entry.summary:
Technologies: Windows 10, Remnux, VirtualBox, dnSpy
We’re given an executable Bypass.exe to analyse. I always like to start by running the file command to see what we’re dealing with:
$ file Bypass.exe Bypass.exe: PE32 executable (console) Intel 80386 Mono/.Net assembly, for MS Windows
This tells us that we’re working with a .NET application, and that means we can use a nifty tool called dn...
